summary: Non-replacement one-handed variant of the Ebony Blade. The mesh has also been altered to make it roughly the same size as an Akaviri Katana.
descriptionHtml:
UPDATE: The new file now includes a scabbard! Menu error is still present, can\'t figure out 1st person models still.

First mod, made this to try to get myself used to working in Nifscope and the construction kit to mostly working results.

This mod places a one-handed version of the Ebony Blade in Dragon\'s Reach (same location as the Ebony Blade is vanillia). The mesh has been altered to make it shorter; it\'s about the same size of an Akaviri Katana. It uses the vanilla textures still for now, everything looks fine except for the bottom of the handle. So don\'t look there.

Bugs:
-The Katana seems to find its way under the table quite often
-The inventory model does not show up (Screenshot showing this)
-Hopefully nothing else

Installation:
File paths should be correct, simply drop it in you Skyrim folder

Uninstall:
Making me cry. Delete EbonyBlade1H.esp in Data and Ebony1h in Meshes/Weapons.

Note: 
Any textures that alter the Ebony Blade will most likely change this as well.
The sword also fits in my characters hand oddly in the screenshots, that\'s because of a Character Creation Editor I used to modify his proportions. 

For the curious, the armor is Saskia\'s armor from the Witcher 2 Models here on the nexus.
